name: Béan Abhaile
description:
Béan Abhaile is a first person immersive experience taking place in an abandoned home. You must uncover the truth about what happened there through navigating the building and its surroundings, you must be careful though, the more you uncover, the more active the spirit residing there becomes.

WASD to move

E to turn on off torch

F to interact

Created By:

Cathal, Tom, Michaela, Emmet and Olivia.
